Skill.label: Cold Snap - Put In Helmet With 5th Link Mod

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
---------- Leveling Gem Links ----------
---- Act 1 ----
-- Starting Links --
- Freezing Pulse + Onslaught (If solo, you need to mule it with a Scion) - Stormblast Mine
-- After Mud Flats and Hail Rake --
- Frost Bomb + Onslaught (Drop Freezing Pulse) - Stormblast Mine + Swift Assembly - Frost Blink + Arcane Surge (Keep at level 1) - Orb of Storms (Link with Onslaught too if possible)
-- Lower Prison --
- Frost Bomb + Onslaught + Added Lightning (gem swap Added Lightning into Stormblast Mine setup for bossing) - *Other links are the same*
-- After Brutus Kill --
- Arcane Surge + *Preferred Movement Skill* (Can use Flame Dash or stay Frostblink) - Smoke Mine
-- After Cavern of Wrath --
- Storm Brand (keep for end-game)
---- Act 2 ----
NOTE: Starting in lvl 16 zones, run Vaal Side Areas. Finding a Vaal Cold Snap or Vaal Righteous Fire is a is a huge boost to leveling.
-- After Chamber of Sins --
- Summon Skitterbots, Herald of Thunder, Cold Snap (level in offhand)
-- After killing Weaver --
- Stormblast Mine + Trap and Mine Damage + Controlled Destruction - If using Flame Dash, can socket Faster Casting if desired - Buy Concentrated Effect, Tempest Shield, and 2x Ele Focus and level in offhand.
---- Act 3 ----
-- After Crematorium --
- Malevolence, Discipline, Frostbite, Enfeeble (level in listed order as slots are available)
-- After Library Quest + Gravicius Kill (BRING PAYMENT ORBS WITH YOU) --
- Vortex, 2x Hypothermia, 2x Efficacy, Swift Affliction, Temporal Chains, Blasphemy
NOTE: Vortex and some important support gems are very Chance Orb intensive, and you may have found as little as 0 Chance Orbs by Act 3. As you accumulate Chance Orbs, purchase gems in this order: Vortex, Hypothermia, Efficacy, Hypothermia, Swift Affliction, Blasphemy
---------- Vortex Swap and Links ----------
Once you have at least a BBBG piece of gear and a BBB piece of gear, you can swap to Vortex after A3 Piety.
GEMS LINKS IN ORDER: - Vortex + Efficacy + Hypothermia + Controlled Destruction (+ Elemental Focus + Swift Affliction if you have a 5L or 6L) - Vaal Cold Snap + Concentrated Effect + Efficacy (+Hypothermia or Elemental Focus if you have a BBBG or BBBB) - Malevolence, Smoke Mine (both unlinked) - Flame Dash / Frostblink + Arcane Surge
GEMS TO STOP USING BUT KEEP FOR LATER (And level in off-slots where applicable): - Frost Bomb, Orb of Storms, Storm Brand, Frostbite, Discipline, Enfeeble, Temp Chains, (continued) Blasphemy, and any remaining Efficacy/Hypothermia/Swift Afflictions that are't in use
---- Act 4 ----
-- After Kaom & Daresso Kills --
- Bonechill, Summon Chaos or Stone Golem - Insert Bonechill into Cold Snap links
Finish campaign and return to the guide for other gem setups.
